verbose_text: Kaiso binds to both methylated CpG (mCpG) sites and specific unmethylated DNA motifs (TCCTGCNA) and represses transcription by recruiting chromatin remodeling corepression machinery to target genes.
evidence: Kaiso binds to both methylated CpG (mCpG) sites and specific unmethylated DNA motifs (TCCTGCNA) and represses transcription
